title: What artists do men listen to? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm all over the map yo. Here are some of my Pandora seeds in no particular order: Goldfrapp (sexy, dance, hip)Van Halen (80s exuberance, happy rock)Mötley Crüe (sexist as hell haha but amazing riffs)Coldplay (too mellow but hints of brilliance)Guns 'n Roses (testosterone rock. Slash is brilliant)Linkin Park ("Nu Metal", aggressive)Crystal Method (feels like you're on crystal meth (not that I would know) and should steal a car)Massive Attack (sex music. seriously the build up in these songs is exactly that of seduction, foreplay, etc ;-))Disturbed (twisted and seriously disturbed but aggressive)Ladytron (hints of brilliance. amazing techno. listen to Destroy Everything You Touch)Led Zeppelin (truly brilliant - 70s rock, lyrics are incredible)Rage Against the Machine (grrraaaaa!!. pure unadulterated anger.)Audioslave (hints of brilliance. Michael Mann movies)Metallica (gods of metal. Master of Puppets)Fatboy Slim (is fucking in heaven. dance/acid-house)Cake (punkish rock, The Distance is awesome - melding a car race with the pursuit of a girl)The Cure (80s new wave stuff. brilliant.  'Lullaby' is like being in a dream)KMFDM (aggressive & Gothic)LCD Soundsystem (brilliant techno)Santogold / Santigold (takes me back to Dubai)Rammstein (aggressive German hardcore - Neue Deutsche Härte)U2 (brilliant, seen them live)Korn (super high testosterone. twisted)Jay-Z (rap, great lyrics. guy was my neighbor)Radiohead (BRILLIANT, but a downer)Janes Addiction (Juanas Addicion! makes me wanna bang my head. here we go!, Perry is genius)Muse (brilliant. Bellamy's operatic voice can send me places)The Black Keys (brilliant, Lonely Boy)Toddler Radio (because lil uns)Jimi Hendrix (genius purple haze)Bob Marley (wow this guy. I can see why people get on his dopey rasta lifestyle)Black Sabbath (original metal. Iron Man!)50 Cent (rap. the guy is jacked!)M.I.A. (genius female rapper from Sri Lanka)Feist (mellow. love her voice)The Doors (70s trippy - must be the right mood. people think he is a genius but I think he was just spewing nonsense)Snoop Dogg (his dog character is funny and love the deep bass lines. relaxed rap)A bunch of these are for weight lifting and are aggressive. Some very mellow. Add comments please!

Guitar : Baiju Dharmajan Keyboard: Stephen devassy Electronic: Tobu, Kasbo Rock bands: Creed, Muse, Skillet and lot more  Metal: Metallica, Iron maiden, ACDC, Children of Bodom, Bullet for my valentine and lot more
